name: bomcomparevx-backend
description: NestJS backend for BOM Compare VX

scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_TEST_ROUTES=true AZURE_KEY_VAULT_URI= GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=dummy GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID=dummy MICROSOFT_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy PORT=4000 npx nest start
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_TEST_ROUTES=true AZURE_KEY_VAULT_URI= GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=dummy GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID=dummy MICROSOFT_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --runInBand
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test
